roleset.name: make fat or plump
roleset.note: PLUMP-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Comparison to ?fatten?. (from plump.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: Hildegarde plumped the cushions of the old lady's chair.
example.arg: the cushions of the old lady's chair.

example.name: Passive with instrument
example.text: [One-third of the fresh chicken sold in the U.S.]-1 is plumped *trace*-1 with water, salt and carrageenan.

example.name: ergative
example.text: The bones and withered muscle and skin plumped with life.
example.arg: The bones and withered muscle and skin
